      • add

        public org.sakaiproject.alias.api.AliasEdit add(String id)
                                         throws org.sakaiproject.exception.IdInvalidException,
                                                org.sakaiproject.exception.IdUsedException,
                                                org.sakaiproject.exception.PermissionException
        Add a new alias. Must commit() to make official, or cancel() when done!
        Specified by:
        add in interface org.sakaiproject.alias.api.AliasService
        Parameters:
        id - The alias id.
        Returns:
        A locked AliasEdit object (reserving the id).
        Throws:
        org.sakaiproject.exception.IdInvalidException - if the alias id is invalid.
        org.sakaiproject.exception.IdUsedException - if the alias id is already used.
        org.sakaiproject.exception.PermissionException - if the current user does not have permission to add an alias.

      • edit

        public org.sakaiproject.alias.api.AliasEdit edit(String id)
                                          throws org.sakaiproject.exception.IdUnusedException,
                                                 org.sakaiproject.exception.PermissionException,
                                                 org.sakaiproject.exception.InUseException
        Get a locked alias object for editing. Must commit() to make official, or cancel() (or remove()) when done!
        Specified by:
        edit in interface org.sakaiproject.alias.api.AliasService
        Parameters:
        id - The alias id string.
        Returns:
        An AliasEdit object for editing.
        Throws:
        org.sakaiproject.exception.IdUnusedException - if not found.
        org.sakaiproject.exception.PermissionException - if the current user does not have permission to mess with this alias.
        org.sakaiproject.exception.InUseException - if the Alias object is locked by someone else.

      • commit

        public void commit(org.sakaiproject.alias.api.AliasEdit edit)
        Commit the changes made to a AliasEdit object, and release the lock. The AliasEdit is disabled, and not to be used after this call.
        Specified by:
        commit in interface org.sakaiproject.alias.api.AliasService
        Parameters:
        user - The AliasEdit object to commit.

      • cancel

        public void cancel(org.sakaiproject.alias.api.AliasEdit edit)

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

      • remove

        public void remove(org.sakaiproject.alias.api.AliasEdit edit)
            throws org.sakaiproject.exception.PermissionException
        Remove this alias information - it must be a user with a lock from edit(). The AliasEdit is disabled, and not to be used after this call.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        edit - The locked AliasEdit object to remove.
        Throws:
        org.sakaiproject.exception.PermissionException - if the current user does not have permission to remove this alias.
